title: Trump Twitz: Should Georgia conduct a review of the ballot papers?
subtitle: It is unlikely that the Office of the Minister for Foreign Affairs of Georgia will continue to examine the signatures of absent voters or change the total vote of their State in 2020.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A review of the signature of absent ballots in Georgia should be carried out, and the results of the 2020 presidential vote in that state could be cancelled.
